title: The Haunted Mansion - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/30/20
itunes:title: The Haunted Mansion - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/30/20
description:
George Noory and author Clete Keith discuss his sightings of ghosts and spirits and other paranormal activity at the Greystone Mansion in Beverly Hills, and whether they may be connected to a family murder in the home.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
